pre_caption: The video begins with a medium shot, capturing a skateboarder's lower body in the center-right middle ground. A concrete ditch fills the foreground, while a grassy bank with a small bush on the left extends across the middle ground. A silver SUV is positioned in the top-left background. As the skateboarder reaches the top of the bank, the camera tilts upward, reframing him in a full shot in the center of the frame.
